name: Baseball Batting Statistics
description: Dataset of baseball players with batting statistics and player details.

columns.name: POSITION
columns.description: Field position of the player (e.g., Catcher, Pitcher).

columns.name: AtBat
columns.description: Number of times the player has been at bat.

columns.name: Hits
columns.description: Number of hits achieved by the player.

columns.name: AVG
columns.description: Batting average of the player (Hits ÷ At Bats).

columns.name: BattingHand
columns.description: Batting hand of the player (L = Left, R = Right).
